name: FloppaCare
description:
Description

Have you ever wanted a pet Floppa that won't rip your face off? LOOK NO FURTHER THAN FLOPPACARE! Our ingenious app teaches you how to pet, feed, and care for your Floppa! Buy "friends", do Floppa things, and MUCH MORE COMING SOON!

This project, btw, is a test for responses and critiques for our planned next project. If all goes well and we gain some feedback I would like to make an RPG. More details to come.

FEATURES
  • "Pet" the Floppa! (Click it and it may make funny noises)
  • Keep your Floppa hampy!
  • Feed your Floppa crunchies!
  • Buy "friends" at the store!
  • Secrets???
